section.title:
work orders pending material availability for
materials pending w/o availability Pending W/O Material Availability
section.para: To view the Pending availability for work order material requirements associated with a work order, go to Manufacture > Reports > Pending Material Availability. The following screen will appear:

note.para: This display shows pending availability for work order material requirements associated with the manufactured parent item.

section.para: When displaying pending work order material availability, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the item number of the item whose pending material availability you want to view.
Specify site whose pending work order material availability you want to display.
Enter the quantity ordered for the hypothetical work order item. The pending availability for material requirements will vary depending on the quantity entered.
Pending work order material availability on or after this date will be displayed.
Enter the date you need to begin building the item.
Select to only show shortages in the display.

Display lists pending work order material availability, using the specified parameters. The display is color-coded for ease of use. Orange text indicates the item has fallen below its Reorder Level. Red text indicates the quantity on hand (QOH) or availability has fallen below 0. This display also features a nested list, with a plus (+) sign located to the far left of any subcomponents. By clicking your mouse on a plus sign, you reveal an indented bill of materials (BOMs).
